# Delete Featured Image

Automatically deletes a featured image if its associated Post is deleted.

**Contributors:** [topher1kenobe](http://profiles.wordpress.org/topher1kenobe)  
**Tags:** [Featured Image](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/Featured Image)  
**Requires at least:** 5.7  
**Tested up to:** 5.7  
**Stable tag:** 1.0  
**License:** [GPLv2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  
**Requires PHP:** 7  

## Description ##

Automatically deletes a featured image if its associated Post is deleted.

Note: does NOT check to see if the image is associated with more than one Post.

## Installation ##

1. Upload `delete-featured-image.zip` to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
1. Activate the plugin through the \'Plugins\' menu in WordPress

### 1.0 ###
* Initial release
